## R Markdown
```{r read}
data1 <- read.csv("data/heart.data.csv")
```

```{r regression}
if("heart.disease" %in% names(data1)){
  data1 <- rename(data1, heartDisease = heart.disease)
}
data1_lm <- lm(heartDisease ~ biking + smoking, data = data1)
summary(data1_lm)
```
